AboutMe

// Here's the breakdown

I began teaching myself how to code last year by making simple web pages using HTML, CSS, and some Javascript. After some time, I knew I wanted to take the next step into coding full time, so I enrolled to a coding bootcamp and successfully graduated in June 2018. Nowadays, the projects I create use the latest and most in demand technologies. My favorites include React, Node and SQL.
Aside from code, I love to play dodgeball, watching documentaries, and board games. And most importantly, I love dogs.
